title: why am i banned .... don't reply if you are not riot staff
body: plz let me know would really like 2 know{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
I took a look at your ban and it looks like you were pretty negative in the two games you were dinged on.

If you need some more context on your ban, it's best to reach out to a Player Behavior specialist by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll clear up things from there.

Because you are toxic, what did you think?

Flaming and being toxic are different things, one is annoying and rude, the other is a bannable offense. Learn the difference
